words.definition: An academy is a special type of school.
words.example: There are many courses taught at the academy that I go to.

words.definition: If something is ancient, it is very old.
words.example: I want to see the ancient buildings in Rome.

words.definition: A board is a flat piece of wood.
words.example: The sign was made of a few wooden boards.

words.definition: A century is one hundred years.
words.example: Our company is celebrating a century of business in London.

words.definition: A clue is a fact or object that helps solve a mystery or crime.
words.example: The detective found a clue that helped him solve the case.

words.definition: A concert is an event where you listen to people play music.
words.example: I enjoyed the concert last night. The band was very good.

words.definition: A county is the largest political division of a state in the US.
words.example: He lives in the largest county in the state.

words.definition: A dictionary is a book that tells you what words mean.
words.example: I use my dictionary to look up words I don't know.

words.definition: To exist is to be real.
words.example: Do you think giants ever really existed?

words.definition: Flat describes something that is level and smooth with no curved parts.
words.example: My parents bought a new flat screen TV.

words.definition: A gentleman is a nice man.
words.example: The gentleman helped the old lady across the street.

words.definition: Hidden means to be out of sight.
words.example: The kids at the party found the hidden candy.

words.definition: Maybe is used to show that something is possible or may be true.
words.example: If I focus on my school work, maybe I will get an A.

words.definition: An officer is a leader in the army.
words.example: The soldiers followed the orders of the officer.

words.definition: If something is original, it is the first one of that kind.
words.example: This is the original painting of the Mona Lisa.

words.definition: To pound is to hit something many times with a lot of force.
words.example: He pounded the nail with the hammer.

words.definition: A process is the steps to take to do something.
words.example: Making a cake is a long process.

words.definition: To publish a book is to get it printed and ready to sell.
words.example: That company publishes many books.

words.definition: A theater is a building where you watch plays or movies.
words.example: We went to the theater to see a play.

words.definition: Wealth is a large amount of money and possessions.
words.example: One of the most important things is health, not wealth.
